scripts.predev: powershell -Command "try { Get-Process ngrok -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; npx kill-port-process 3001 3000; Write-Host '🧹 Processes and Ports cleaned' } catch { Write-Host 'ℹ️  No processes to clean or cleanup failed' }"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACK,FRONT,NGROK" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgYellow.bold" "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run tunnel"
scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
